shortDescription: Zemana AntiLogger v2.74.204.664 is vulnerable to an Arbitrary Process Termination vulnerability by triggering the 0x80002048 IOCTL code of the zam64.sys and zamguard64.sys drivers.
vulnerabilityName: Zemana AntiLogger Arbitrary Process Termination Vulnerability
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
